content.detailedDescription:
I am from england and i was at turtle beach sukabumi indonesia for a few days break from my home in jakarta indonesia with my indonesian girlfriend siti who was walking along the beach around lunchtime on 10th october 2014, i took approximately 8 photos of her walking along the beach about 1 second apart.

when she looked at the photo's only 1 of them had a green object above her head that seemed to be a fair way out at sea and therefore quite large.

on inspecting the photo's taken a second before and a second after the one i submitted to you there was no object in the other photo's.

we showed the picture to 5 or 6 westerners that were around and watching us as the area is quite sparse and none of them saw the object.
content.summary: A ufo appeared in a picture i took of my girlfriend at the beach

content.detailedDescription: At around 09:55 p.M to 10:20 p.M i was in backyard of house looking at sky suddenly i noticed something moving in sky it was moving i thought it to airplane but it was too low for airplane to fly. also i thought it to be birds flying making arow
content.summary: Big boomrang like triangle like shape. size of 5 helicopters in row. flying slowly no noise. dim white lights on both wings like structure.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo looks like it's hovering close to the direction of what looks like nuclear plant by hoffner road, but not sure. all i saw was it pulsates these lights as it pulsates it becomes transparent. off and on image. to me it look like it was shooting at something or calling it's other small crafts into the ship, so i don't know. looks like a star craft ship, but it's oval in the transparency. i have always seen this craft by this area, so it's either observing or doing something while being stationary. last time i saw this craft it glowed and showed a transparent glass/silver metal sheen to it, but up close i have seen this really huge. so, this craft is in the area by hoffner road a lot. my feeling is that this ship is good not like the other ones that are reptilian or the greys.
content.summary: Just hovering ufo

content.detailedDescription:
With a friend going to the corner store.
it was shining in the sky
unknown 
it was bright and moving really slow across the sky it just kept going straight until i couldn't see it anymore.
i was very excited to see what i was seeing i couldn't keep my eyes away  from it
i lose sight of it until it was gone
content.summary: A friend and i  saw a a big white bright light in the skies

content.detailedDescription: I was at work walking to my vehicle around 9am. i was walking east when i noticed a bright light in the sky. i was like wow the sun was really reflecting of that plane. the object kept moving westerly. i watched it for about 15 seconds. when i got to my vehicle i opened the hood checked a few things, which took about 30 seconds. i looked back to the direction of the light and the suns reflection was letting up. thats when i noticed it was moving slow. i watched it for another 30 seconds and the suns  reflection was completey off of it and i'm like thats not a plane. it was silver cigar shaped. i could not see wings at all. i watched it for proably 4-5 min before it disappered to the west side of the building. there was no vapor trail of any kind. i did get a pic of it. the object never changed coarse. i happend to look up about 1 min later and saw a jet traveling east, i could make out wings and a vapor trail, and it was moving faster then the object was. so what i saw was no airplane.The weather this day was sunny, no clouds in the sky.
content.summary: Unkown object flying across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
With a friend going to the corner store.
it was shining in the sky
unknown 
it was bright and moving really slow across the sky it just kept going straight until i couldn't see it anymore.
i was very excited to see what i was seeing i couldn't keep my eyes away  from it
i lose sight of it until it was gone
content.summary: A friend and i  saw a a big white bright light in the skies

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the park then there was a concert going on and i was in the parking lot area just above the concert and the lights off. of which i took this photo.
content.summary: I was at walnut hill park in new britain connecticut 8:55 p.M. and i observe this picture i will be sending you it was amazing and of course the other witnesses with me. check it out tiffany's back to me.

content.detailedDescription: The sun had just gone down and it was just my three kids, my dad, and i at the elementary school field following soccer practice.  two airplanes were in the air.  my eight year old son said, "there's a fast satellite."  when i looked up, there was an object at a similar altitude as the two planes, however it was moving significantly faster.  it had flashing blue lights on its perimeter.  the blue lights turned to both green and red and it came to a very abrupt stop.  it completely stopped briefly in midair, then completely changed its flight path; about a 15 degree angle.  it didn't go backwards on the same path, rather it went back in the general direction from where it came.  i have never, ever seen anything like this in my life.  it was moving way too fast to be an airplane.  airplanes cannot stop so immediately, and then change direction so quickly and drastically.  it changed colors.  it was flying at the same altitude as two other planes.  it could not have been a remote controlled device as it was too high and covered way too much distance.  unbelievable and creepy experience.
content.summary: Bright, multi-colored lights. fast object, stopped, totally changed direction.

content.detailedDescription: around 7:30pm ( central time) i walked outside to take the trash to the end of my drive way.  it was dark, cool, and cloudless with many stars visible in the sky.  as i looked to the horizon, i noticed a very bright white ball of light traveling through the sky at a rather slower speed than what an airplane would be traveling at it's assumed height.  the size of the light was much larger when compared to a star or an airplane and did not blink. the size was about an aspirin size from where i stood.  about 15 seconds into watching the light it suddenly flashed very brightly for about a half of a second.  the light then just continued on its route and faded away about 15 seconds later- which was strange because i still had plenty of sky to watch it.  while i was watching i just had this strange feeling that it wasn't "normal"  especially when it flashed as if it was blinking at me which it only did that once.
content.summary: Very bright ball of light much larger than an airplane or a star.  traveling through the sky (not falling) suddenly brightened with a flash and then continued on for abut 15 more sec. until it faded out.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home around 11:00pm going west on butler blvd. at 11:07 i noticed lights in the sky ahead of me to the left of the highway just above the tree line. at first, i logically thought it was an airplane, but as i got closer i realized that it was not moving at all, and it was also extremely low for how big of an object it was. my next thought was that it was a helicopter of some sort, but as i got even closer, i could not see any type of propellers on it, and there was no noise coming from it. when i got the closest, i was almost underneath it. i could see that it was triangular in shape, and had a big bright, almost white light facing the direction i had been coming from, and some red and blue lights on the corners of the triangle with a small light on the back 'corner'. the bottom was a glowing orange/red-ish color, but i'm not sure if it was a reflection of the city lights or if it was glowing itself. i watched it (not moving) on butler blvd for a good 5 minutes, while driving, before i exited on southside blvd south. i could still see it to my left while i was on southside, and pulled into fscj deerwood campus to stop and watch it. by the time i pulled around to the front of the campus where i would have been able to see it perfectly, it was gone. this was 10 minutes after i had initially seen the object. although i dont think i could give an exact estimation of its size in feet, it was very big and obvious in the sky. at arms length, its apparent size was roughly softball sized. i would be shocked if i were the only one paying any attention to it, but i am very curious to know if anyone else saw it.
content.summary: I saw a large, stationary, hovering object with lights above butler blvd

content.detailedDescription:
Weather map captures contrail of something going what appears to be from north carolina to estimated destination of pyongyang north korea around the time of 22:00gmt/17:00est.

radar has no contrail before or after this time, but contrail is captured across over 5,000m/11,000km track 

was noticed in a weatherpro application on iphone, have spliced the pictures together, and attached the weather maps prior and post to these ones so you can compare if this helps.
content.summary: Possible contrail seen on weather radar map

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home celebrating my birthday number years 14 when recivi a call from my dad and i went out to the street from my condo when i appeared the ufo over my head half three times a soccer field was moving east on sealine line, the phone had a lot of interference that was then and i began to get a headache and had a burn on his leg.
the ovni was very big, i in that moument i feal a lot of fear, i lose sight of te object when pass a mountain.
content.summary: Big with a form of a triangle with four lights

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the garage getting ready to work on my sons car. i was standing smoking a cigarette before i entered the car and i happened to look up in the sky ( which i often do since my childhood encounter). i noticed a black object in the north eastern sky at first i thought maybe it was an airplane till i noticed it was hovering and the shape. the shape looked similar to a v but more like a fighter. i know usa does not have any aircraft like this i said to myself. i continued to watch it and it just sat there hovering it did have what looked like a beam coming down from it but i couldn't tell. it was a partly cloudy day but the sky seemed very blue more so then normal for some reason. i saw clouds pass above it. i watched it for 20 minutes before it slowly turned and headed east then shot like a bullet up into the clouds faster then anything i have ever seen faster then any airplane we have far as the military or civilian goes.I made no sound what so ever no smoke from the engines or anything.I was kind of excited about seeing it i know they exist and seeing it just means they are getting more and more frequent.
content.summary: Hovered then slowly headed east then it shot like a bullet into the clouds. boomerang looking object did not make a sound and did not leave a exhaust trail.

content.detailedDescription:
on the evening of oct.14th 2014 around 10:45pm i went out the front door(which faces east) of my house to close the windows on my old truck. it was a very clear night, not one cloud...When i finished with my truck i
looked towards the eastern skyline, i saw the constellation " cassiopeia".
i had read in "astronomy" mag that the "m13" galaxy could be seen within
about 1 degree from the constellation, so i looked all around it but saw nothing...I was thinking that on the next night i would use some binoculars.  just when i was turning to go back in the house, i caught a glimpse of something moving towards me in the sky, very close to where i had been searching......My eyes had become adjusted to the darkness by then
and at first i thought it may be a flock of geese or duck flying in a 'v formation"...But as it got closer i could see that it was a well structured
craft shaped like a triangle with large dim lights...It moved in a straight path almost over my position...I estimated it was traveling at 300 to 500 mph...I viewed the craft till it vanished in the western horizon!...Or about 30 to 45 seconds....I also estimate it size to be approximately the size of a half moon, and my distance from the craft (at it's closest ) at 3000 to 5000'.....The craft made no sounds, i had no time to grab a camera or even inform anyone else of what i was seeing....As the ufo flew almost overhead i had many thoughts...How closely it might resemble the "phoenix lights" craft...How lucky i was to see such an object....The lights weren't bright but dimmed...Reminded me of some "ghost ship" stories of sailing ships...Unless someone (like myself) just so happened to be looking in the right direction...They would never had known what had just flown over their heads......After i completely lost site of the ufo i hung around for about 5 minutes more just to see if there were any other craft, or planes or jets that may be in pursuit....Nothing...Nothing on the news afterwards either...Still...I felt awed to have witnessed the event!...I thought it best to report it to "mufon!"    wish i had some witnesses or additional evidence....But i do not!
content.summary: Observed large triangle shaped ufo-large dim lights...

content.detailedDescription:
While attending junior school as a child, we were called to line up in our class groups to wait for bell to resume lessons.
while in line i noticed, when looking up, a fireball travelling left to right high on horizon. it was a sunny day, no cloud cover.
the entire playground - teachers and pupils - looked up when i said: 'what's that?'
we all stood and watched; some speculated that it was a plane on fire. when a white objected left the underside of the object and descended, this was the most obvious explanation. however, there was no sound and the object did not behave like an aircraft in distress. it did not change direction or appear to be losing altitude.
the white object disappeared while everyone focused on the fireball.
the fireball itself continued in its flight path until it passed beyond sight.
we were all quite shaken by this. teachers were unable to provide any sort of explanation and became quite terse, refusing to discuss it any further.
there were no reports of a crashed aircraft on news broadcasts on that day or since. 
the incident has had a lasting impression on me, but having lost contact with everyone from that school i have no way of confirming it or discussing it with them.
content.summary: Object seen in children's playground while in junior school around 1967-69; fireball that ejected a white orb. orb descended, disappeared. fireball continued straight line flight path until out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I have seen these lights for at least a year now. i had to mark one date in this application so i marked the newest one which is this morning. however, i have been seeing those lights for a long long time. i don't know what they are - i can see them from my flat, almost every morning if i am up at around 7, sometimes it's been 6 or 8, never seen it during a day. the time changes as the sunrise changes - it seems to be around the time of sunrise (however, different direction, they are visible in the north). it sounds like some kind of a naturally occurring phenomenon, i know and i have considered it when i first heard about the lights from my brother-in-law who lives with us and gets up to work early. as soon as i saw them myself, however, i started to doubt in the natural phenomenon hypothesis - the way they move seems to be completely deprived of any pattern, but at the same time it does look artificial (making zig-zags or flying in a formation, for example). sometimes only a few can be seen and sometimes it must be around 15 at least. as i said they appear and disappear, you can often tell though that it is still the same object disappearing and reappearing on its path. don't know what else i may say - i just really want to know what it is, i thought maybe something from the raf bases in the north? if so, it would have to be some unconventional type of flying objects anyway, due to their unusual movement. i would like somebody to get back to me and investigate it - i can't really take a picture - it's the time of a day when the light is not the greatest and the street lights are still on - therefore, i can't really capture it with my phone camera, i did try. i tried a telescope as well but it is too difficult to focus it on them as their movement is quite random. i hope somebody will consider it and contact me one day about it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Numerous lights, appearing/reappearing, flying in random directions, every morning for the last year

content.detailedDescription: At approxamitly 2:30 in the morning as i was leaving work and heading home, i was driving up 15th street towards conneticut from rangeline. i noticed a light pretty far away in the sky, and not thinking much of it kept driving home. i figured it must be an airplane or helicopter. the object got closer and closer in an almost unrealistic amount of time. within three minutes the object was already only about 200 feet in front of me. it was tear drop shaped and has multicolored pulsating lights, with a gray/ or silver body type. they windows revealed lights on the inside but i saw nothing walking around. my car started acting odd and the speakers turned all the way up and killed the battery. as i went to grab my phone to take a picture it was dead. i was terrified. as the object hovered for another thirty second i finally saw some sort of apparition inside the object, but nothing well enough to actually determine what it was. im not sure what the object was but i was relieved when it had finally gone past me. my car came back on by itself like nothing had happened. there was a brief moment inbetween my car starting and the object flying away for 2 minutes that i dont remember anything, and the time seemed to have just dissapeared. after the object started to dissapear i noticed a military style airplane flying in the same direction as if it was looking for the object. im not sure what was going on, or what exactly i saw but it was the most terrifying moment in my life.
content.summary: The craziest thing happened while i was driving home, when i didnt have any choice but to stop and look at the pulsating lights infront of me.

content.detailedDescription: While driving south on the garden state pkway at around the waretown exit marker looked straight up and saw a black disk shaped object in the sky, the sky was clear that day with a few high light clouds.  to my surprise it was hovering and flashing what appeared to be a greenish light and my son was with me and he saw it too.  it did some hovering then manouvering back and forth and then went behind a cloud came out and then assended up. the view looked like i see from other people when they say they see a ufo flying in sky and the pictures they send in.  this sighting was quick for about a couple of minutes.
content.summary: Ufo was dark black disk shaped with greenish light flashing, shiny

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in the terrace.
2. i didn't noticed the object. i saw it only few minutes after, at home, in the picture taken.
3. a ufo or something like that.
4. nothing to say.
5. i was surprised to have been there in that moment, but i didn't hear nothing. no sound, no noise.
6. i realized i had framed and took a picture maybe of a ufo, only after seeing the photos at home.
content.summary: It was invisible at nude eye. it was visible only in the picture taken

content.detailedDescription:
On november 25, 1982 (thanksgiving day) while on duty in guard tower #5 at kriegsfeld army depot in what was then west germany i observed a very dark triangular shaped craft fly from the south west over the valley, over the town of gerbach and directly over my watch tower flying in a northwest direction.  i observed the craft for over ten minutes as i picked it out over the horizon to the southwest.  it was a natural occurrence to see military aircraft on a normal basis during hours of daylight.  i often observed a-10, f-4f, f-111 and ov-10 aircraft in the area and was quite familiar with all military aircraft of the era.  it was a hobby for me to watch aircraft and could easily identify aircraft by sight and often just by the noise of their engines. this dark aircraft peaked my attention because it was flying very slowly and very straight.  it was normal to see the aircraft that flew in that area to have some movement, however slight on all three axis of movement.  this unknown craft flew as if it were on rails.  slow, steady with no appreciable movement outside of the northwest direction of travel until it actually flew above me.  i would estimate that due to the height of my watch tower and the location of the army depot on the highest hill in the area and perched at the edge of the hill where i could observe the valley that stretched out in front of me that i first saw the aircraft at least 15 km distant to me,  possibly even further.  it took at least 7 to 10 minutes for the craft to fly that distance until it was directly above me.   as if flew directly over head, i stepped out onto the tower landing with m-16 in hand and looked straight up at this object.  i could not identify it's manufacture as any aircraft i had ever seen.  it made no noise of any type.  i noticed a marked absence of noise of any kind at that moment. i later thought of it as a type of tunnel vision as i was concentrating so hard to identify the craft.  the other notable event that no aircraft could do was as it flew directly over me.  as it passed over the craft rotated 360 degrees nose down.  it pointed directly at me during this 360 degree rotation.  it ended up pointing in the same direction it had originally been pointing after this 306 degree nose down rotation.  i must also note that the aircraft at no time lost it's forward momentum of travel while undergoing this maneuver.   i had the overwhelming feeling that it was acknowledging my presence with this maneuver or was "checking me out" as it did it.  the craft continued in the northeast direction and made a slight direction change to the north that would have taken it over another "non-nuclear" depot just up the road.   
because of my security clearance and status under the personal reliability program i just buried the incident and didn't report it to anyone.  i can only presume the other military policemen in towers 2,3 and 4 either suppressed their sighting of the aircraft for the same reasons as i or they did not observe the craft because they were asleep.  it was not uncommon for guards to sleep in the towers.  the moral of the unit was very low and the duties there were tedious and at time quite harsh.  
i had long forgotten the incident until watching a program on the history channel when the sighting in brussels was brought up.  

i know aircraft very well and can easily identify types and makes visually.  this was no aircraft known to me.  it flew too perfectly.  had no noise of any kind and performed a 360 degree nose over roll without any lose to forward momentum or altitude.   it has been many years but i am sure i could trace the flight path over a map of the area.  the army depot is still there.  it has been converted into a windmill power station now.
content.summary: Dark triangle craft over nuclear weapons depot

content.detailedDescription: I was up at a wedding venue at a farm barn and had been setting the tables and chairs up ready for the weekend, i got a cold drink and went outside as it was a sunny clear day, the farm is about 20 miles from the airport so usually see a lot of planes flying past. i heard the noise of a plane so looked up and watched it fly past, just as i was about to look back down i saw a blue,turquoise glowing light streaking towards my direction leaving a trail behind it,i seemed to freeze and couldn't believe what i was seeing, it was travelling faster than anything i've ever seen and seemed to be climbing in altitude. it went passed me really fast then disappeared seeming from where i was sitting to have left the atmosphere. i shouted to my partner to come out incase anything else happened and told her what i'd seen, she told me that when they do wedding parties at night she's seen some strange lights in the sky before but this is the first time for me. i don't know what it was but i can say for sure that it wasn't a meteor or a comet as it was too low and was gaining height not coming downwards. it went by too fast to get my camera phone out so i have no evidence to back up what i saw , but i know i saw somethng that i can't explain.
content.summary: I was sitting outside the barn and saw a plane overhead, just as the plane passed saw a bright blue /turquoise ord streak across the sky leaving a trail behind it, i could see for miles and it was travelling faster than anything ive ever seen

content.detailedDescription: Unknown object photographed in early morning.  i was testing a new camera and took a series of pictures from 2 different locations about 50 feet apart.  i did not notice the object when i took the pictures.  the object is oddly shaped, appears metallic and reflected light.  i thought it was possibly a drone but the shape doesn't lend itself entirely to that.  the object seemed to move from high to low then high again.  it appeared to be over the city although the distance is difficult to assess.
content.summary: Took 3 pictures, noticed object when i examined the pictures later

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving class from gammage theater at arizona state university, walking through the east parking lot back to my dorm across the street to the east. with a clear view of the partially clouded night sky in the direction i was headed, a bright blue light in the sky caught my eye immediately. i was lucky enough to look up the moment i noticed the light. the light appeared to move horizontally to the ground heading straight east for roughly two to three miles at an elevation just under the clouds and then disappeared with no trace. the speed of the light seemed to be about the same as if you were to look up on a clear night in a rural setting and spot a shooting star. it made no sound. the event lasted roughly half a second.

being a strong, educated believer in various alien species, my immediate response was that i had just witnessed an alien aircraft leaving earth. i then tried to rationalize. it could not have been a commercial airplane or a military jet because of the speed of the blue light, and the absence of sound before, during, and after the event. it also could not have been a shooting star because of the cloud cover and the fact that the city lights hide most stars in the night sky.

i made a rough reenactment of the event using a screenshot of the exact spot i was at when i saw it (courtesy of google street view) and some primitive video editing. the video is only to represent the flight path, speed, direction, and distance. this video does not depict the correct time of day or accurate weather conditions. this is exactly how i remember it.
content.summary: Glowing blue sphere, shooting star-like path yet under cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: Me & my late husband had several expierences one night i walked outside on my porch to smoke a cigarette with my husband i looked at him & he looked like he seen a ghost i didn't even ask i followed his eyes i saw the same the brightest neon green light i ever seen it was soo bright it was 30-40 feet from us right in my driveway. i remember having a feeling of fallen into the light we have no memory after that.We lost time i remember seeing it from a distance as it made a upside down u shape and shot up in the air so fast.We felt frozen after it disappeared we could feel the air again we could breathe again we could feel our hearts beat again after this occurred birds were chirping in a panic & dogs for miles were barking in a panic.We had vision problems for a few days similar to a welders burn.We don't know what happened who do you tell without looking like your looney tunes.We kept it to ourselves. we've had several experiences one night i was pulling onto my property i live on acres in the country & caught a clear shaped being running from my vehicle i caught it in my headlights it was clear like the predator movie it turned it's head at me & disappeared. i can't believe what i saw if you told me this i would have never believed it.These lights still hover over my property still till this day several of them always in triangle form.I can walk out my house right now in their there...Their always there!Our government has to be aware of this.Sincerely i wish i had a explanation!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was sitting on porch with late husband saw the brightest lite i've ever seen it kept getting closer to us we lost time had a feeling of falling into the light its like we were frozen when we came to we had vision problems similar to a welders burn.

content.detailedDescription: It has been seen almost every night from september to now. it turns itself on about 8 pm and blinks out 6-8 hours later. it moves to different quadrants of the same area of sky over port jefferson, almost appears like its tring to mimic a star but its way to bright and luminous. there are 3 light sources, green, blue and white that appear to surround it.
content.summary: Green, blue and white very bright pulsating light hovering for hours in ne sky over li sound

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my lanai tonight when i happened to look over the trees.  i saw an object that was glowing white with one each red and green, very bright, non-strobing lights.  as soon as i saw it, it immediately sped nw at, what i took to be in excess of 200 mph.  suddenly, it stopped.  it did not slow down, it just stopped.  after a second or two, it sped off on a 45 degree tangent.  it did not ramp up to speed, it simply appeared to reach high speed immediately. it did this abrupt start and stop with direction change two more times.  then it hovered for a few seconds and descended in a vertical line behind the tree line.  not as fast as before.  perhaps twice as fast as a helicopter.  i waited for a half minute or so and it ascended in a vertical line, paused for a couple of seconds, then descended again.  i have not seen it again.  my wife also witnessed a portion of this sighting.  i spent my navy career (retired) in naval aviation and am familiar with most types of aircraft.  what this object did is, i believe, beyond current capabilities.  as to my emotions, i was initially unsure, but when i saw the extraordinary maneuvers, i was sure that i was seeing a ufo.  unfortunately, i was too entranced to even think about grabbing a camera or cell phone.  henceforth, i will have my cell phone with me on the lanai at all times.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Sped at ~200 mph then stopped.  did not slow down, just stopped,  changed directions using abrubt angle turns.  dropped and rose w/o slowing.

content.detailedDescription:
In hunting camp northwest of tonasket, wa. it was about bed time just sitting around the small propane patio heater. i was glancing towards the sky admiring the heavens. 

i observed a very bright white lighted object in the nw sky moving towards the se off on the horizon. i found it odd because i did not see any other lights (red/green) that you see on aircraft. just very bright white light. i then observed it moving at a pretty decent pace. faster than a jet at the same altitude. i watched it for about 2 min. i looked away for a second and then went to look for it again and it had vanished.

it made no sound that i could hear.
content.summary: Extremely light object in sky moving at fast pace

content.detailedDescription: While watching tv, we noticed an increase in plane activity in the area, however while watching the planes we then noticed bright blue lights in the sky to the north of our house.  we watched these objects dart from place to place and then they would stay in one position.  while trying to photograph a few, they darted in and out of view.
content.summary: The objects moved/darted around then stayed in place and began darting again

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting outside smoking a cigarette about 10 pm.  stars were bright, and then a brilliant flash of blue and white light emanating from a disk shape. 3 seconds later it disappeared. it appeared large.

i said to myself "what was that?" and sat for 1 hour observing the direction of the ufo.  i am now a believer.
content.summary: Large disk of blue and  white light flashed and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on back porch having a cigarette and i was just looking around and i happened to see a white teardrop object drop out of the sky. it looked like it went straight down in front of the two story house behind me. i thought it could be a firecracker but it didn't make any noise. right after it disappeared i saw a reflection on the balcony fence of the house. that only lasted about 3 sec. i went inside to tell my husband and we went back outside to see if maybe there were meteor showers going on. it was partly cloudy so you couldn't see that many stars.
content.summary: I saw a teardrop object fall from the sky.
